short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block stylesheets, fonts and media to save bandwidth

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block stylesheets, fonts and media to save bandwidth. Using the 'declarativeNetRequest' permission, this plugin creates a blocking rule for the following resource types:
- Stylesheet
- Font
- Media

This allows you to save bandwidth while still getting the important information from the pages you're viewing.
